body_html:
Running the following script should trigger a cuda OOM error when using a 1080 GTX Ti, and should not trigger it when commenting the line with checkpointing and uncommenting the next one.

https://gist.github.com/ssidorenko/c9d250c666498a43d4ba165808ee89a6

Note: this code snippet is inspired from @prigoyal's checkpointing tutorial
body_text:

body:
Running the following script should trigger a cuda OOM error when using a 1080 GTX Ti, and should not trigger it when commenting the line with checkpointing and uncommenting the next one.

https://gist.github.com/ssidorenko/c9d250c666498a43d4ba165808ee89a6

Note: this code snippet is inspired from @prigoyal's [checkpointing tutorial](https://github.com/prigoyal/pytorch_memonger/blob/master/tutorial/Checkpointing_for_PyTorch_models.ipynb)
